title: Can one speak unambiguously of “The” Scientific Method? - Quora

response.answer_text: Science is better characterised as the preference for evidence-based reasoning rather than believing in Received Wisdom. The old procedural definition fails to characterise sciences like Astronomy, Archeology, Anthropology or Biology that rely on observation rather than experiment. Most modern Science rely on Big Data Analytics and can no longer be fit into the old “method” description. Following on from the Royal Society's motto “Nullius in Verba”, the following distinction is a better characterisation of Science as The Questioning Paradigm. The Fundamental Difference between Religion and Science
